title: Have skin or not
body: Sometimes you will find on the other side the same champion that you are playing and you are at the same lane, but the difference is that he has the skin and you not. Some players will think: he has the skin,  maybe he plays better than me, so I must play safelier. But this doesn't make any sense! Because have skin or not doesn't mean if someone is more skilled or not! So play normally, and don't have fear! Otherwise your team will loose for your fault, so please, play for yourself but also for your teammates!

replies.body: but with skins you have +20% dmg in bronze
and with blitz skin you have 40% probability grabbing someone under tower too ^^
E perché io devo essere torturato da quest'uso di "loose"?
perchè c'è un post in inglese sull'EUW??
your story rikendled my spirit man
